location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.555 of 1857 (Political Department) from Commander Felix Jones, Political Agent Persian Field Force, Civil Commissioner & Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter relates to salary payments made to sweepers at the Residency in Bushire, and whether these should be paid from the Residencyâ€™s civil or military accounts.
